trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference" /> .

trans-unit.source: When a script reference is rendered, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs> object contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object that is defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma referência de script é processada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs> objeto contém o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> definida no objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instância.

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object and modify it as needed.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> eventos para verificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> de objeto e modifique conforme necessário.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows an ASP.NET Web page that references a script file that is named CustomScript.js.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra uma página da Web do ASP.NET que faz referência a um arquivo de script chamado CustomScript.js.

trans-unit.source: When the Web application is hosted on the www.contoso.com domain, the [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is set to a value specific for that domain.
trans-unit.target: Quando o aplicativo Web é hospedado no domínio www.contoso.com, [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> propriedade é definida como um valor específica para esse domínio.

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event checks the host URL and changes the value for the [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property if it is necessary.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> evento verifica se a URL do host e altera o valor de [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> propriedade se for necessário.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> que contém o script de cliente referenciado na página da Web.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> object that contains the script library.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> que contém a biblioteca de script.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference" /> que contém o script de cliente referenciado na página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs.Script%2A> property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs.Script%2A> propriedade é adicionada ao <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> propriedade quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> é gerado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET Web page that references a script file that is named CustomScript.js.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra uma página da Web do ASP.NET que faz referência a um arquivo de script chamado CustomScript.js.

trans-unit.source: When the Web application is hosted on the www.contoso.com domain, the [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property is set to a value specific for that domain.
trans-unit.target: Quando o aplicativo Web é hospedado no domínio www.contoso.com, [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> propriedade é definida como um valor específica para esse domínio.

trans-unit.source: An event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event checks the host URL and changes the value for the [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> property if it is necessary.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> evento verifica se a URL do host e altera o valor de [ScriptReference.Path]<xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceBase.Path%2A> propriedade se for necessário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object is retrieved through the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs.Script%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> objeto é recuperado por meio de <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs.Script%2A> propriedade.
